## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Charlie Slaughter v. the State
**판결일**: 1915-02-03
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Davidson, Harper

## 변호인

Cunningham  Sewell  and  Woodward  Baker,  for appellant. — On question of corroboration of accomplice testimony: McCullar v. State, 36 Tex.Crim. Rep.; Barnes v. State, 37 id., 320; Fine v. State, 45 id., 290; Woolley v. State, 50 id., 214; Snodgrass v. State, 31 S.W. Rep., 366; Spenrath v. State, 48 S.W. Rep., 192.

On question of court's charge on accomplice testimony: Muhlhause v. State, 56 Tex.Crim. Rep., 119 S.W. Rep., 866, and cases supra.

 C.C. McDonald,  Assistant Attorney General

## 인용

- 174 S.W. 580
- 76 Tex. Crim. 157

## 판결문 요약

I dissent. May write later. I believe the plain definition of the offense contained in the statute ought to control this court....
